altername_name: Tun Shi Tian Di 3: San Guo Wai Chuan
Tūn Shí Tiān Dì 3: Sān Guó Wài Chuān
Tenchi o Kurau III: Sangoku Gaiden
Tenchi wo Kurau III: Sangoku Gaiden
name: Chinese Fighter III
overview: Tenchi wo Kurau III: Sangoku Gaiden (天地を喰らうⅢ三国外伝), also known as Tun Shi Tian Di 3: San Guo Wai Chuan (吞食天地3 三国外传) or Chinese Fighter, is an unlicensed fighting game developed for the Sega Mega Drive. Its origins are largely unknown.
